text: Oh Johnny, How You Can Love is a 1940 American film directed by Charles Lamont and starring Tom Brown and Peggy Moran. It was an early appearance of Laird Cregar. The film cost $100,000. ==References== ==External links== * *Oh Johnny How You Can Love at TCMDB Category:1940 films Category:American films Category:American musical films Category:English-language films Category:Films directed by Charles Lamont Category:1940 musical films Category:American black-and-white films
title: Oh Johnny, How You Can Love
